summary: Frontend testing of Product Tour feature using React Joyride. All 14 features tested and working correctly. Tour auto-starts for first-time users, has 9 steps, proper styling, localStorage persistence, and Help button restart functionality.

issues: Minor: Chart width/height console warning (The width(-1) and height(-1)...) but charts display correctly

passed_tests: Product tour appears for first-time users on dashboard (localStorage cleared)
Tour has exactly 9 steps as indicated (Step X of 9)
Tour shows 'Skip Tour' and 'Next' buttons
Tour tooltip shows correct dark theme styling (#1A1A1B background)
Tour uses correct primary color (#F45D3D) for Next button
Tour tooltip has rounded corners (12px border-radius)
Help button (?) in TopBar successfully restarts tour
Tour completion saves to localStorage key 'eka_tour_completed'
localStorage contains version: '1.0', completed: true, completedAt timestamp
Returning users (with localStorage set) don't see tour automatically
Skip Tour button works and saves completion to localStorage
data-testid='dashboard-stats' present and visible
data-testid='revenue-chart' present and visible
data-testid='sidebar-nav' present and visible
data-testid='user-profile' present and visible
data-testid='chat-input-area' present and visible on Chat page
data-testid='voice-input-btn' present and visible on Chat page
data-testid='job-cards-filter' present and visible on Job Cards page
data-testid='new-chat-btn' present and visible in Sidebar
data-testid='nav-job-cards' present and visible in Sidebar
data-testid='nav-chat' present and visible in Sidebar
data-testid='tour-help-btn' present and visible in TopBar
tour_steps_verified: Step 1: Welcome to EKA-AI! (centered, no target)
Step 9: You're All Set! (centered, with help tip)
critical_code_review_comments: Good: ProductTour component properly wraps app in AppShell.tsx
Good: Tour uses localStorage key 'eka_tour_completed' with version tracking
Good: Help button uses window.startProductTour() global function exposed by ProductTour
Good: All required data-testid attributes are present for tour targets
Good: Tour styling matches dark theme (#1A1A1B bg, #F45D3D primary)
Good: Tour has proper step-by-step progression with Back/Next/Skip/Finish buttons
Minor: Dashboard chart console warnings about width/height (cosmetic, not affecting functionality)
seed_data_creation: None needed - tour is client-side only
context_for_next_testing_agent: Product Tour feature is fully implemented using React Joyride. Tour auto-starts for first-time users (no eka_tour_completed in localStorage). Tour can be restarted via Help button (?) in TopBar. Tour has 9 steps covering: Welcome, Sidebar Nav, New Chat, Dashboard Stats, Revenue Chart, Job Cards Nav, AI Chat Nav, User Profile, Finish. All data-testid attributes are in place for tour targets.

product_tour.auto_start_first_time: Working - tour appears 1.5s after dashboard load for new users
product_tour.skip_button: Working - dismisses tour and saves to localStorage
product_tour.finish_button: Working - shown on step 9, saves completion
